DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect Ficus carica Descurainia Sophia irritable bowel syndrome predominant constipation . Half patient receive Ficus carica others receive Descurainia Sophia 4 week .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Assessment Effects Flixweed Fig Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Predominant Constipation Gastrointestinal Function : Single Blind Randomized Parallel Trial
DOC.criteria: patient irritable bowel syndrome predominant constipation Subjects significant cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , pulmonary , endocrine , metabolic , hematologic disorder , structural abnormality gastrointestinal tract disease ‚ÅÑconditions affect bowel transition , surgery , prokinetic laxative drug use past month , medication may affect gastrointestinal motility , therapeutic dietary advice IBS , use Fig Flixweed last month , diarrhea , pregnancy breastfeeding
